In Breaking Dawn - Part 2, the happiness of the newlyweds Bella Swan (Kristen Stewart) and Edward Cullen (Robert Pattinson) is cut short when a series of betrayals and misfortunes threatens to destroy their world. After giving birth to Renesmee (Mackenzie Foy), awakens Bella already a vampire. She discovers that Jacob (Taylor Lautner), her best friend, imprinted with his daughter and begins to accompany its rapid development. Bella does not accept this fact at the beginning, but then they understand and live in harmony. Meanwhile, Aro (Michael Sheen) devises a plan to get the girl in his power, thanks to the special gifts she has.
